rules: Rule1: If the game system is tested, then it is integrated.
Rule2: Provided that the game system is validated, it is tested.
Rule3: If the vehicle is connected, then it is autonomous.
Rule4: Provided that the vehicle is smart, it is also connected.
Rule5: Whenever autonomous transportation is successful, then if the vehicle being certified does not imply non-compliance, the vehicle is smart.
Rule6: Either the vehicle is malfunctioning or the game system is not operational.
Rule7: If the financial product is approved, then it is profitable.
Rule8: Either the financial product is approved or the technology is deployed.
Rule9: Provided that the technology is deployed, the vehicle is not malfunctioning.
Rule10: Whenever the game system is updated, then if the financial product is profitable, the vehicle is not malfunctioning.
Rule11: If the technology is maintained, then whenever the financial product is profitable, the vehicle is not malfunctioning.
Rule12: Provided that the vehicle is secure, it is functional.
Rule13: If it is not the case that upgrading the vehicle implies functionality, then the vehicle is compliant.
Rule14: Under the condition that upgrading the vehicle does not lead to functionality, the vehicle is certified.
Rule15: Provided that the approval of the financial product does not lead to the vehicle not malfunctioning, the game system is validated.
Rule16: Whenever the approval of the financial product does not result in the vehicle not malfunctioning, the game system is not integrated.
Rule17: If it is not the case that the game system is updated or the technology is maintained, then the vehicle is upgraded.
Rule18: Under the condition that the game system is not updated and the technology is not maintained, the vehicle is secure.
Rule19: Whenever it is false that the game system is updated or the technology is maintained, the vehicle is not functional.
Rule20: If the project is not funded, then the game system is operational.
facts: Fact1: The autonomous transportation is successful.
Fact2: The vehicle is not autonomous.
